name: Absorption
description:
In Absorption, you live by absorbing from enemies. You get score faster when you absorb more enemies at the same time.

It’s easy to play and insanely additive.
When you get familiar with it, you will see that there’s nothing more satisfying than the feeling of genuine achievement after you’ve absorbed so many enemies.

ONE-HANDED CONTROLS:
Touch and move the circle, super simple.Touch anywhere to move the circle.If your finger blocks the circle, try touch elsewhere to move.

ABSORB ENEMIES:
You get score by absorbing enemies. And they will die when being drained.

AVOID HITING ANYTHING:
You will die hitting a wall or a enemy.

SPECIAL EFFECT:
Want to get a super power up? Survive 35 seconds first.

FEATURES:
>Really addictive quick-fix game
>Different types of enemies
>35 unique levels
>Save and share your progress on Game Center.
